description:
This 30+ Video and eBook program will be your personal step by step guide to re-innovating and rejuvenating your goals, methods, mind-set and career!

Personal Performance Development is the first essential move for Fast Tracking Your Career to Success. All mental and physical obstacles need to be overcome and the first Chapter of this course will show you exactly how to do that. With modules on Addressing Fear, Self Believe & Motivation, Courage, Focus, and a Holistic Approach to Life.

The second Chapter deals with Goal Setting & Achieving and learning how to stretch yourself to ensure you achieve your goals! Using Mru Patel’s unique systems such as SmartER Goals , MOT Goals, PBE, PAR and more, you will be able to realise what you really want out of life and how to map your way there. Discover why people fail and move forward by learning from their mistakes!

This course which is set of short videos, books and webinar sessions is a proven system designed to help you create positive performance gains that will dramatically improve the quality of your life on all levels.

Limited Time Price of Just $65! Begin now to take advantage of this offer!

Whatever you may be dealing with, this system and program will dramatically increase your performance in every aspect of your life in a balanced manner. You will truly have a transformational journey with this latest thinking breakthrough in education.

This course is designed with simplicity in mind and short videos as the author strongly believes that many people don’t actually have the time to read or listen to hours of tapes and videos. It is for this main reason that’s it’s filmed in the Author’s own home in a relaxed environment in order to convey the messages and tips effectively. The listeners should also listen and take notes for this training in a relaxed environment and NOT at their workplace/desk where it could have the daily disruptions and stresses. Over 87% of people who buy books and videos of such nature never finish them for that very reason. it is for this reason the course in done short 1-4mins fast punchy videos covering main tips and lessons.

This powerful 30 videos, webinars and eBooks system is designed to maximize your performance and show dramatic results in just 30 mins or LESS per day utilizing proven effective techniques that are not available from any other source. Everyone learns in different ways, and this course covers all bases. When you join this course, you will receive bonus material from time to time, added to the membership area you have access to for a lifetime with a money back guarantee.

With 30 + videos of training, at least 3 live webinars with Q&A of training, and eBooks provides access to the world class experiences that people pay $2,000+ per month. A single live session with the Author is $1,000 per hour to train with Mru Patel live, hence for a small fraction of the price you have access to all of this material with a lifetime membership to his program and money back guarantee. The reason for this is the tools and techniques Mru Patel has compiled over the past decade traveling the world, teaching and training with the top coaches, public speakers, teachers and masters in the fields of Personal transformation, personal development, health and wellness, Entrepreneurs, Best Selling Authors, and many more in this field.
title: 30 Ways to Increase Your Personal & Business Performance
